name: Escape room - The interrogation
description:
In this VR escape room game, you find yourself being trapped into an interrogation room. Solve all puzzles an use the available items in order to find your way out before you can't get away anymore. 

Features
  • Intuitive puzzles
  • Physically driven VR controls

This game has been made as a project for my study. Here I created all models, interactions and the game myself in a period of 80 combined hours, using the Unity game engine and Blender.
